name: rallly
description: Rallly is a self-hosted meeting scheduler similar to Doodle. It allows participants to vote on preferred times and includes a clean mobile-friendly UI.
features: Time slot voting: Participants select their available times from proposed options to find the best meeting time.
Anonymous participation: Allow respondents to vote without creating accounts or providing personal information.
Real-time updates: See votes appear instantly as participants respond to your poll.
Mobile optimized: Create and respond to polls from smartphones with a touch-friendly interface.
Shareable links: Distribute polls via simple URLs that work across email, chat, and social media.
Deadline setting: Automatically close polls after a specified date to finalize meeting times.
Comment threads: Let participants discuss scheduling conflicts and preferences within the poll.
Calendar integration: Export finalized meeting times to Google Calendar, Outlook, or iCal.
Multiple time zones: Display proposed times in each participant's local time zone to avoid confusion.
Admin controls: Lock polls, hide results, or delete options as the organizer.
Email notifications: Send automatic reminders to participants who haven't voted yet.
Privacy focused: Host your own instance to keep scheduling data under your control.
